Key Match Events: Buddy Hield made a solid debut for the Golden State Warriors with 22 points.
Steph Curry recorded a double-double with 17 points and 10 assists.
The Golden State Warriors secured a blowout 139-104 win over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Scoot Henderson scored 22 points off the bench for the Portland Trail Blazers.
Deandre Ayton had a double-double with 10 points and 11 rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: The lack of floor balance and communication played a key role in Portland's loss.
The visitors will be pleased to have nailed most of their game plans early on in the season.
